code: import{Pie,Bar,Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Charts=()=>{const chartData={labels:['January','February','March','April','May','June'],datasets:[{label:'Sales Data',data:[65,59,80,81,56,55],backgroundColor:['rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)','rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)'/* more colors */],borderColor:['rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)','rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)'/* more colors */],borderWidth:1}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"charts",className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl mb-4",children:"Charts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-2 gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:chartData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:chartData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:chartData})]})]});};
